rules_text:
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn if you control eight or more lands.
{1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
